page.title: 02Attitudes in Mayfield
page.content: Our survey of 27th June showed the major issues are (1)New shops_4 built & opened in 1985. (2)Traffic. (3)Amenities.Our survey showed that the new shops are popular especially the Bakery,but many villagers feel Mayfield needs even more shops of a greater variety & price range (shops here are expensive). The major problem in Mayfield is traffic particularly the amount of large vehicles which block our narrow High Street.Almost all are in favour of a By_pass.Parking is also a problem;some feel there should be more yellow lines while others say they discourage trade. Everyone feels there should be more evening activities for the young because there is no railway & the bus service stops at 7pm & doesn't run on Sundays.
